verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah <WH3050>. Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3050>; for he is good <WH2896>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Who can utter <WH4448> the mighty acts <WH1369> of Jehovah <WH3068>, Or show forth <WH8085> all his praise <WH8416>?
Blessed <WH835> are they that keep <WH8104> justice <WH4941>, And he that doeth <WH6213> righteousness <WH6666> at all times <WH6256>.
Remember <WH2142> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, with the favor <WH7522> that thou bearest unto thy people <WH5971>; Oh visit <WH6485> me with thy salvation <WH3444>,

That I may see <WH7200> the prosperity <WH2896> of thy chosen <WH972>, That I may rejoice <WH8055> in the gladness <WH8057> of thy nation <WH1471>, That I may glory <WH1984> with thine inheritance <WH5159>.
We have sinned <WH2398> with our fathers <WH1>, We have committed iniquity <WH5753>, we have done wickedly <WH7561>.

Our fathers <WH1> understood <WH7919> not thy wonders <WH6381> in Egypt <WH4714>; They remembered <WH2142> not the multitude <WH7230> of thy lovingkindnesses <WH2617>, But were rebellious <WH4784> at the sea <WH3220>, even at the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>.
Nevertheless he saved <WH3467> them for his name <WH8034>'s sake <WH1369>, That he might make his mighty power to be known <WH3045>.
He rebuked <WH1605> the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220> also <WH2717>, and it was dried up: So he led <WH3212> them through the depths <WH8415>, as through a wilderness <WH4057>.
And he saved <WH3467> them from the hand <WH3027> of him that hated <WH8130> them <WH1350>, And redeemed them from the hand <WH3027> of the enemy <WH341>.
And the waters <WH4325> covered <WH3680> their adversaries <WH6862>; There was not one <WH259> of them left <WH3498>.
Then believed <WH539> they his words <WH1697>; They sang <WH7891> his praise <WH8416>.
They soon <WH4116> forgat <WH7911> his works <WH4639>; They waited <WH2442> not for his counsel <WH6098>,
But lusted <WH183> exceedingly <WH8378> in the wilderness <WH4057>, And tempted <WH5254> God <WH410> in the desert <WH3452>.
And he gave <WH5414> them their request <WH7596>, But sent <WH7971> leanness <WH7332> into their soul <WH5315>.
They envied <WH7065> Moses <WH4872> also in the camp <WH4264>, And Aaron <WH175> the saint <WH6918> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
The earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> and swallowed up <WH1104> Dathan <WH1885>, And covered <WH3680> the company <WH5712> of Abiram <WH48>.
And a fire <WH784> was kindled <WH1197> in their company <WH5712>; The flame <WH3852> burned up <WH3857> the wicked <WH7563>.
They made <WH6213> a calf <WH5695> in Horeb <WH2722>, And worshipped <WH7812> a molten image <WH4541>.
Thus they changed <WH4171> their glory <WH3519> For the likeness <WH8403> of an ox <WH7794> that eateth <WH398> grass <WH6212>.
They forgat <WH7911> God <WH410> their Saviour <WH3467>, Who had done <WH6213> great things <WH1419> in Egypt <WH4714>,
Wondrous works <WH6381> in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>, And terrible things <WH3372> by the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>.

Therefore he said <WH559> that he would destroy <WH8045> them <WH3884>, Had not Moses <WH4872> his chosen <WH972> stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> him in the breach <WH6556>, To turn away <WH7725> his wrath <WH2534>, lest he should destroy them <WH7843>.
Yea <WH3988>, they despised the pleasant <WH2532> land <WH776>, They believed <WH539> not his word <WH1697>,
But murmured <WH7279> in their tents <WH168>, And hearkened <WH8085> not unto the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
Therefore he sware <WH5375> unto <WH3027> them <WH5307>, That he would overthrow them in the wilderness <WH4057>,
And that he would overthrow <WH5307> their seed <WH2233> among the nations <WH1471>, And scatter <WH2219> them in the lands <WH776>.
They joined <WH6775> themselves also unto Baal-peor <WH1187>, And ate <WH398> the sacrifices <WH2077> of the dead <WH4191>.
Thus they provoked him to anger <WH3707> with their doings <WH4611>; And the plague <WH4046> brake in upon them <WH6555>.
Then stood up <WH5975> Phinehas <WH6372>, and executed judgment <WH6419>; And so the plague <WH4046> was stayed <WH6113>.
And that was reckoned <WH2803> unto him for righteousness <WH6666>, Unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755> for <WH5704> evermore <WH5769>.
They angered <WH7107> him also at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4808>, So that it went ill <WH3415> with Moses for their sakes <WH4872>;
Because they were rebellious <WH4784> against his spirit <WH7307>, And he spake unadvisedly <WH981> with his lips <WH8193>.
They did not destroy <WH8045> the peoples <WH5971>, As Jehovah <WH3068> commanded them <WH559>,
But mingled <WH6148> themselves with the nations <WH1471>, And learned <WH3925> their works <WH4639>,
And served <WH5647> their idols <WH6091>, Which became a snare unto them <WH4170>.
Yea <WH2076>, they sacrificed their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> unto demons <WH7700>,

And shed <WH8210> innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818>, Even the blood <WH1818> of their sons <WH1121> and of their daughters <WH1323>, Whom they sacrificed <WH2076> unto the idols <WH6091> of Canaan <WH3667>; And the land <WH776> was polluted <WH2610> with blood <WH1818>.
Thus were they defiled <WH2930> with their works <WH4639>, And played the harlot <WH2181> in their doings <WH4611>.
Therefore was the wrath <WH639> of Jehovah <WH3068> kindled <WH2734> against his people <WH5971>, And he abhorred <WH8581> his inheritance <WH5159>.
And he gave <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of the nations <WH1471>; And they that hated <WH8130> them ruled over them <WH4910>.
Their enemies <WH341> also oppressed <WH3905> them <WH3665>, And they were brought into subjection under their hand <WH3027>.
Many <WH7227> times <WH6471> did he deliver <WH5337> them <WH4784>; But they were rebellious in their counsel <WH6098>, And were brought low <WH4355> in their iniquity <WH5771>.
Nevertheless he regarded <WH7200> their distress <WH6862>, When he heard <WH8085> their cry <WH7440>:
And he remembered <WH2142> for them his covenant <WH1285>, And repented <WH5162> according to the multitude <WH7230> of his lovingkindnesses <WH2617>.
He made <WH5414> them also to be pitied <WH7356> Of <WH6440> all those that carried them captive <WH7617>.

Save <WH3467> us <WH3068>, O Jehovah our God <WH430>, And gather <WH6908> us from among the nations <WH1471>, To give thanks <WH3034> unto thy holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>, And to triumph <WH7623> in thy praise <WH8416>.

Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, From everlasting <WH5769> even to everlasting <WH5769>. And let all the people <WH5971> say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>. Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah <WH3050>.
